name: test_e2e_with_logs[832_CRLF_UTF8_001]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_UTF8_001` |
| **Name** | UTF-8 encoded CRLF injection |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | utf8_crlf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
